5.In view of the fact thathe apologized, you should forgive him.
6.  He apologized. Ergo,you should forgive him.
7.Given thathe apologized, you should forgive him.
8.  He apologized, andbecause of thatyou should forgive him.
9.Afterhe apologizes, you should forgive him.
10.  He apologized. As a result,you should forgive him.
11.Seeing ashe apologized, you should forgive him.
12.  He apologized. For that reason alone,you should forgive him.
